summary: Consume the MISP API to interact with various resources like attributes, events, tags, and more.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (e.g., Attribute, Event, Tag).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., Create, Delete, Get).

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: UUID of the event to attach the attribute to.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Select the type of the attribute (e.g., Text, URL, Comment).

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value of the attribute to be created.

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Additional fields for creating an attribute.
